[Home](./index.md) \> [@esengine/ecs-framework-monorepo](./ecs-framework-monorepo.md) \> [Bits](./ecs-framework-monorepo.bits.md)

## Bits class

64位位集合类，用于高效的位操作 支持最多64个位的设置、清除、查询和逻辑运算

**Signature:**

```text
export declare class Bits 
```
